specifications.Dye Method: Piece Dye - Appearance > Scalloped Scalloped edges feature a series of rounded, wave-like curves along fabric hems or trims, adding a delicate and elegant detail that enhances the garment's overall appearance.
specifications.Care Advice: Knit When you receive a knit product, it may be stiff and wrinkled. This is because the fabric has been folded and compressed for shipping. To soften and straighten the fabric, you should condition it for 2-3 days at room temperature before using it.
specifications.Care Instructions: Hand wash only Wash separately Do not wring, Do not rub Do not bleach Flat dry Do not tumble dry Do not iron Sustainability Eco-forward > Dead Stock This fabric is deadstock (leftover from previous productions) and will not be restocked after selling out. Recommended Use Bridal
